column4: How do I get a list (as text file) of programs that I've directly asked Synaptic to install?  (i.e. I don't want packages that were only installed because they were dependancies)
I beleive there's an option to export the list of installed software
Alright so I ran "dist-upgrade"  and it only wanted to download 10MB? http://pastebin.com/d6acf35be
I don't see an option like that
